meta.name: description
meta.content: Wilson Public Schools is located in Henryetta, OK.

div.div:
The Wilson Public School District, in cooperation with parents, students, and the community, will develop students to their fullest potential so that they may become responsible, productive citizens in a rapidly changing multicultural and technological society.
Wilson Public Schools will strive to maintain the highest academic standards and work to ensure that each student will be treated fairly and given an equal chance to succeed in reaching his or her highest potential in every aspect of the public school domain.

h2.a: Our FFA Chapter has been named a 2019 National 3 Star Gold Emblem Chapter!

div.div:
This is an amazing accomplishment! Chapters that receive a gold rating by their state FFA associations are eligible to compete
for National FFA 3-star, 2-star or 1-star ratings. Each chapter that competes for these awards will receive a multi-year plaque and a spur designating their 3-star, 2-star or 1-star rating. They will receive additional spurs for each year they compete and receive a rating from the National FFA Organization.

li.span: grade and we offer childcare, The Tiger Cubs
school located between Henryetta and Okmulgee
